cards.title: Connected at the spa
cards.body: We met at the spa Wednesday the 29th.I was sort of following you around a bit and we seemed to have some connection and were touching a bit in the hot tub.Id like to have exchanged numbers or something so we could get to know each other better, but you seemed a bit in a hurry to leave after getting dressed. Im sort of frustrated if that was it. I liked you. Itd make my day if you replied and gave me some info so I know its you and to confirm you know who I am.

cards.title: This morn on El Camino Real near the old truck!
cards.body: You are the most breathtaking man I have ever met. When I was standing near you, everthing was so unbelievable! I cant wait seeing you again. Contact me if you also found me looking quite appealing to your kind of taste..

cards.title: Looking for Ed, a skinny, very tall guy, right in front of
cards.body:
Ed,
Hey man. I got robbed at the gun point on 13th ave, right outside my apartment. Consequently, Ive lost my phone and with knowing nobody here to help me, I...

cards.title: Zsuzsi...
cards.body:
You were amazing and I screwed it up so bad. I really would like to have another chance. I want to be all you were to me. My mind was so cloudy, but you made me so happy. So happy that it scared the life out of me. I was so concerned with this s that did not matter, I lost you. You wanted me... I lost you. I turned you away. I wish I was with you now... a year later and we moving on to make something great. I hope you are happy. I hope you did find someone good... but I guess I really hope you miss me. You know I desired to make you happy. I was just messed up from some crazy past. That is not your problem and I should not have allowed it to mess us up. My fault. I wish I was just honest with you so you could have assured me with a lovely kiss from your beautiful lips.I miss your hair. Eyes, lips, sexy ass, legs, I miss you. All 100% grade A vegan you. I love you Zsuzsi.
Jaime
